1.6.0 / 2014-09-03
==================

==================

 * add `ignoreMethods` option

1.4.1 / 2014-08-22
==================

 * csrf-tokens -> csrf
 
1.4.0 / 2014-07-30
==================

 * Support changing `req.session` after `csurf` middleware
   - Calling `res.csrfToken()` after `req.session.destroy()` will now work

1.3.0 / 2014-07-03
==================

 * add support for environments without `res.cookie` (connect@3)
